name: unholy-souls-mc-backend
description: Backend API server for Unholy Souls MC website

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js backend'
scripts.db:migrate: node -e "import('./db/connection.js').then(async (db) => { try { await db.syncDatabase(false); console.log('✅ Database migration completed successfully'); process.exit(0); } catch (err) { console.error('❌ Database migration failed:', err); process.exit(1); } })"
scripts.db:sync: node -e "import('./db/connection.js').then(async (db) => { try { await db.syncDatabase(true); console.log('✅ Database sync completed successfully'); process.exit(0); } catch (err) { console.error('❌ Database sync failed:', err); process.exit(1); } })"
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:sync && npm run db:seed
scripts.render:build: echo 'Build completed - database setup will run on startup'

author: Unholy Souls MC
